name: Die Monsters
description:
Made in under 48 hours for the Miz Jam 2020, with the challenge of using this art kit.

Die Monsters is a dice strategy game where you can either use your current item or roll the die to try for something better. Careful, rolling over 9 will cause you to skip a turn, as will rolling an unlucky X. 

Item NumberNameEffect0Small ShieldBlocks 50% damage1Small SwordDeals 50% damage2Small PotionRestores 2 HP3Small CoinsGives 3 Coins4Medium SwordDeals 100% damage5Large ShieldBlocks 100% damage6Medium PotionRestores 5 HP7Large CoinsGives 10 Coins8Large SwordDeals 200% Damage9Large PotionRestores full HP
